programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Onder de grond van de legendarische straten van New York bevindt zich een enorm netwerk van leidingen die het rioleringssysteem van de stad vormen. New Yorkers creren gemiddeld 1,3 miljard gallons afvalwater per dag.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York is een van de weinige steden die aangedreven is op stroom om onder anderen de oude gebouwen mee te kunnen verwarmen.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Brooklyn Bridge en de George Washington Bridge zijn beroemde New Yorkse bruggen en hebben veel invloed gehad op architectuur wereldwijd. Ze vergen wel veel onderhoudt.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York City staat misschien bekend als de betonnen jungle, maar de parken zijn al vanaf het begin aanwezig. De 30.000 hectare aan parken in de stad dienen als ontsnapping voor New Yorkers en spelen op vele onzichtbare manieren een belangrijke rol.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Er vliegen nergens zoveel vliegtuigen boven een stad als New York. De luchthavens hebben ruim 140 miljoen passagiers per jaar.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Het licht laten branden in New York City is geen gemakkelijke taak, en naarmate New York een groenere toekomst tegemoet gaat, zal de manier waarop de stad elektriciteit opwekt niet anders kunnen dan evolueren.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Het is niet gemakkelijk om water van het Noorden naar de kranen van meer dan acht miljoen mensen in New York City te krijgen. Te zien is hoe New York City aan water komt via waterzuivering en kilometerslange ondergrondse tunnels.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: De Twin Towers waren iconen in de skyline van New York. Maar op een ochtend in september waren ze er niet meer. Wat volgde was meer dan twee decennia van concurrerende visies en tegenslagen die leidden tot het nieuwste herkenningspunt van de stad.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Duiven en New Yorkers: het is een relatie die al eeuwen teruggaat, en zoals de meeste relaties in New York City is het ingewikkeld. Sommigen haten ze terwijl anderen er geen genoeg van kunnen krijgen.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York staat bekend als een van de smerigste steden in Amerika, met naar schatting bijna twee miljoen knaagdieren die door de straten zwerven. Bekeken wordt hoe New York City met zijn knaagdieren omgaat.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Wat bijna honderd jaar geleden begon als een kleine vloot auto's, is uitgegroeid tot een bruisend systeem van duizenden gele taxi's. Maar de dreiging van apps en stadsschandalen heeft taxichauffeurs in duizenden dollars aan schulden achtergelaten.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Er komen veel dingen voorbij wanneer aan New York City gedacht wordt, maar hoe de stad omgaat met zijn afval is daar meestal niet een van. Een blik op hoe New Yorkers elk jaar meer dan veertien miljoen ton afval verwerken.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Onder de grond van de legendarische straten van New York bevindt zich een enorm netwerk van leidingen die het rioleringssysteem van de stad vormen. New Yorkers creren gemiddeld 1,3 miljard gallons afvalwater per dag.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York is een van de weinige steden die aangedreven is op stroom om onder anderen de oude gebouwen mee te kunnen verwarmen.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York is een van de weinige steden die aangedreven is op stroom om onder anderen de oude gebouwen mee te kunnen verwarmen.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Brooklyn Bridge en de George Washington Bridge zijn beroemde New Yorkse bruggen en hebben veel invloed gehad op architectuur wereldwijd. Ze vergen wel veel onderhoudt.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York City staat misschien bekend als de betonnen jungle, maar de parken zijn al vanaf het begin aanwezig. De 30.000 hectare aan parken in de stad dienen als ontsnapping voor New Yorkers en spelen op vele onzichtbare manieren een belangrijke rol.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Er vliegen nergens zoveel vliegtuigen boven een stad als New York. De luchthavens hebben ruim 140 miljoen passagiers per jaar.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Het licht laten branden in New York City is geen gemakkelijke taak, en naarmate New York een groenere toekomst tegemoet gaat, zal de manier waarop de stad elektriciteit opwekt niet anders kunnen dan evolueren.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Het is niet gemakkelijk om water van het Noorden naar de kranen van meer dan acht miljoen mensen in New York City te krijgen. Te zien is hoe New York City aan water komt via waterzuivering en kilometerslange ondergrondse tunnels.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: De Twin Towers waren iconen in de skyline van New York. Maar op een ochtend in september waren ze er niet meer. Wat volgde was meer dan twee decennia van concurrerende visies en tegenslagen die leidden tot het nieuwste herkenningspunt van de stad.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: Duiven en New Yorkers: het is een relatie die al eeuwen teruggaat, en zoals de meeste relaties in New York City is het ingewikkeld. Sommigen haten ze terwijl anderen er geen genoeg van kunnen krijgen.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York staat bekend als een van de smerigste steden in Amerika, met naar schatting bijna twee miljoen knaagdieren die door de straten zwerven. Bekeken wordt hoe New York City met zijn knaagdieren omgaat.

programme.title: NYC Revealed
programme.desc: New York is een van de weinige steden die aangedreven is op stroom om onder anderen de oude gebouwen mee te kunnen verwarmen.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Door talloze megalodontanden van over de hele wereld te onderzoeken, zijn wetenschappers tot de conclusie gekomen dat de prehistorische haai zijn reusachtige proporties kon bereiken door al in de baarmoeder met zijn vleesetende dieet te beginnen.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Longest Living Vertebrate
programme.desc: Nieuwe informatie over de Groenlandse haai bevestigt dat hij het langst levende gewervelde dier is.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Genetici werken nu aan de wederopstanding van de uitgestorven Tasmaanse tijger.

programme.title: The Rise & Fall of T-Rex
programme.desc: Twee wetenschappelijke rebellen onderzochten het mysterie achter de dood van Tyrannosaurus rex.

programme.title: The Rise & Fall of T-Rex
programme.desc: Twee wetenschappelijke rebellen onderzochten het mysterie achter de dood van Tyrannosaurus rex.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: We leven in een gevaarlijke wereld waar geologische ongelukken, zoals avalanches, aardverschuivingen, hittegolven, zinkgaten en sneeuwstormen, bijna net zo'n ramp kunnen veroorzaken als de grote cataclysmen.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Verkenning van een reeks nucleaire rampen en industrile ongelukken van over de hele wereld.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Deze aflevering laat zien dat veel verbeteringen in de luchtvaarttechnologie de gevaren van het vliegen in de loop der jaren hebben verminderd, de risico's niet allemaal zijn gelimineerd.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: In juli 2013 botst een passagierstrein met te hoge snelheid in een spoorboog. Zulke ongelukken gebeuren overal ter wereld en zijn meestal erg bruut. Deze documentaire onderzoekt nu de achtergrond van de ergste treinrampen.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain
programme.desc: Ontdek de wetenschap van het overtuigen en hoe zelfs een verstokte scepticus kan worden overtuigd.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain
programme.desc: In deze aflevering onderzoekt dokter Jack Lewis de neurowetenschap achter het genie. Hij ontmoet een echt genie, Sabrina Chevannes, een vrouw met een IQ van 178 op slechts vierjarige leeftijd.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: OSIRIS-REx is NASA's eerste ruimtevaartuig dat monsters neemt op een asterode genaamd BENNU. Het moet een touch-and-go (TAG) monster verzamelen, wat een reeks manoeuvres inhoudt die het ruimtevaartuig naar het oppervlak van de asterode brengt.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Een particuliere groep wil het eerste Isralische ruimtevaartuig op de maan laten landen.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: 66 miljoen jaar geleden sloeg een asterode in op het Mexicaanse schiereiland Yucatn en veroorzaakte een massale uitsterving van dinosaurirs. Er wordt onderzocht wat er kan gebeuren als een dodelijke asterode de aarde opnieuw treft.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Het ICARUS-systeem volgt de bewegingen en het gedrag van de wezens op aarde met behulp van een antenne op het internationale ruimtestation om volggegevens te verzamelen, wat nieuwe ontdekkingen oplevert die kunnen waarschuwen voor natuurrampen.

programme.title: Desperate Hours

programme.title: American Icons
programme.desc: Thomas Edison had geen klein ego en promootte zichzelf graag als een zelfstandige uitvinder. Maar je kunt niet in je eentje 1100 patenten aanvragen in je leven.

programme.title: American Icons
programme.desc: Het geheim van Twains succes was dat hij een verlangen van allerlei mensen liet weerklinken en weerspiegelen. Mark Twain werd de meest populaire stem in Amerika.

programme.title: American Icons
programme.desc: Koloniaal Amerika had geen vrijheid van godsdienst, de mannen die de Onafhankelijkheidsverklaring ondertekenden, haatten elkaar. De reden dat deze feiten niet bekend zijn, komt door Thomas Jefferson.

programme.title: American Icons
programme.desc: Een kijk naar de persoonlijke kant van de man die geanimeerde personages tot leven bracht, een revolutie teweegbracht in entertainment en de toekomst zag als een magische plek vol mogelijkheden.

programme.title: Connections with James Burke
programme.desc: Raketbrandstof, de polaroidcamera en hondenplas leiden ons naar het punt waarop AI niet meer te onderscheiden is van menselijke intelligentie. De vraag is wat dat zal betekenen voor de mensheid.

programme.title: Connections with James Burke
programme.desc: Raketbrandstof, de polaroidcamera en hondenplas leiden ons naar het punt waarop AI niet meer te onderscheiden is van menselijke intelligentie. De vraag is wat dat zal betekenen voor de mensheid.

programme.title: Connections with James Burke
programme.desc: James verbindt de punten tussen de tandenstoker van Napoleon en de Nielsen tv-waarderingen om te zien hoe wetenschappers de kwantumcomputer hebben gebouwd, een gegevensverwerkende machine die zo krachtig is dat hij de toekomst kan voorspellen.

programme.title: Fatal Shot
programme.desc: Een blik op de moordenaars achter de dood van Mahatma Gandhi, Martin Luther King Jr. en John F. Kennedy. De gebeurtenissen die hen dreven te doen wat ze deden en de nalatenschap van hun slachtoffers.

programme.title: Hitler's Secret Science
programme.desc: Tijdens de Tweede Wereldoorlog nemen Duitse en geallieerde wetenschappers het tegen elkaar op. In een geheime onderzoeksfaciliteit op Usedom werken Hitlers briljante natuurkundigen en ingenieurs aan revolutionaire technologien.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Experts ontdekken verrassende feiten over de Chachapoyas, de wolkenkrijgers uit Zuid-Amerika.

programme.title: Bright Now!
programme.desc: In 1938 vangt een Amerikaanse onderzoeker 500 makaken en brengt ze naar een onbewoond Caribisch eiland om de populatie primaten te bestuderen die vrij rondlopen in een reusachtig openluchtlaboratorium.

programme.title: Bright Now!
programme.desc: Vijftig jaar na Apollo 13, vertellen gezagvoerder Jim Lovell en Apollo-ingenieurs over de vindingrijkheid en bovenmenselijke inspanningen die een ruimteramp veranderden in een buitengewone overlevingsstrijd.

programme.title: American Icons
programme.desc: Thomas Edison had geen klein ego en promootte zichzelf graag als een zelfstandige uitvinder. Maar je kunt niet in je eentje 1100 patenten aanvragen in je leven.

programme.desc: Een kijk naar de persoonlijke kant van de man die geanimeerde personages tot leven bracht, een revolutie teweegbracht in entertainment en de toekomst zag als een magische plek vol mogelijkheden.

programme.title: Connections with James Burke
programme.desc: Raketbrandstof, de polaroidcamera en hondenplas leiden ons naar het punt waarop AI niet meer te onderscheiden is van menselijke intelligentie. De vraag is wat dat zal betekenen voor de mensheid.

programme.title: Connections with James Burke
programme.desc: James verbindt de punten tussen de tandenstoker van Napoleon en de Nielsen tv-waarderingen om te zien hoe wetenschappers de kwantumcomputer hebben gebouwd, een gegevensverwerkende machine die zo krachtig is dat hij de toekomst kan voorspellen.

programme.title: Customs
programme.desc: A grandmother loses her cool after a suspect package is found in her laptop officers in Birmingham stub out a couple's plan to make a quick buck high traces of cocaine are found in Gatwick.

programme.title: Customs

programme.desc: A charismatic passenger stirs up conflict between the immigration staff, while customs officers target those smuggling animal products.

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Blowing Up History

programme.title: You Have Been Warned
programme.desc: Een blik op de slimme en dappere mensen die wetenschap gebruiken om hun vaardigheden te perfectioneren, van offroad-schaatsen tot het trekken van een wheelie met een boot.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: The search for a missing teen in Poland leads a rookie reporter (Cindy Sampson) and her companions to an encounter with deadly cultists.

programme.title: The Stick Up Kids
programme.desc: Santos (Tariq Alexander) and his friends become hustlers to earn money on the streets in Harlem and eventually use their skills to help stop a project from ruining their stomping grounds.

programme.title: Bushwick
programme.desc: Lucy emerges from a Brooklyn subway to find that her neighborhood is under attack by black-clad military soldiers. An ex-Marine corpsman, Stupe, reluctantly helps her fight for survival through a civil war as Texas attempts to secede from the U.S.

programme.title: Night's End
programme.desc: After moving into a haunted apartment, a shut-in hires a stranger to perform an exorcism.

programme.title: Depraved
programme.desc: A disillusioned field surgeon who is suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder makes a man out of body parts and brings him to life in a Brooklyn loft.

programme.title: The Bunker Game
programme.desc: After several mysterious accidents, a live-action role playing game is interrupted and the players leave the bunker while the staff remains behind to investigate the disappearance of the game's mastermind, Greg.

programme.title: Trick
programme.desc: A detective tries to track down a masked killer who reappears every Halloween to wreak bloody havoc.

programme.title: Mayhem
programme.desc: Fired from his law firm, a man and a former client must fight for their lives when a mysterious virus causes employees to become violent and aggressive. They join forces to reach the executives on the top floor and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Voodoo Possession
programme.desc: Aiden travels to a Haitian insane asylum to find his brother and discovers all the inmates and staff are possessed by a bloodthirsty voodoo spirit.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Two black American social scientists pose as bank robbers to study racial dynamics in small-town law enforcement.

programme.title: Apartment 4E
programme.desc: Trapped in a dark world of her own making, Piper (Nicole Beharie) has not left her apartment in a long time. A knock on her door reveals a stranger who may have answers to the mystery at the center of her world.

programme.title: Kindred
programme.desc: Plagued by mysterious hallucinations, a pregnant woman suspects that the family of her deceased boyfriend has intentions for her unborn child.

programme.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A desperate former boxer takes work as a drug courier and winds up in a jail where his enemies force him to commit acts of violence.

programme.desc: Moira prepares for her headline debut at the Asbestos Fest; David deals with some loitering teens in the apothecary.

programme.desc: Alexis and Twyla go out for a girls' night; David gets a lesson on compromise.

programme.title: Alan Cummings: Paradise Homes
programme.sub-title: Alan Cummings Paradise Homes S01 E03 Highland Hideaways and Caves
programme.desc: On a journey back to his rugged roots of the Scottish Highlands, Alan experiences an extraordinary hidden getaway living in harmony with ancient land, complete with 360 views and golden eagles circling the property. In Sicily, Alan tours an eccentric family home built above a cave, filled with innovative and intricate space-saving details, including a one-of-a-kind bedroom climbing wall!

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man S05 E01 - Rome With Matt Lucas
programme.desc: Richard is joined by Matt Lucas, actor, comedian and many other things besides, for a frenetic 48 hours in the eternal city, Rome. Over a packed duo of days they cram in culture, cuisine, history, hats and as many sights as they can see.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man S05 E02 - Valencia With Sara Pascoe
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Sara Pascoe for a two day test of the mini break merits of Valencia. Together they ruthlessly examine Spain's third largest city, taking in its history, parks, architecture, culture and cuisine, as well as falling under the powerful spell of local cocktail agua de Valencia.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man S05 E03 - Amsterdam With Joe Lycett
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedian Joe Lycett head to the mini break mecca of Amsterdam for a 48 hour hurtle through the city's attractions. In just two days the pair power through culture, cardio, canals, cuisine and much more, not all of it beginning with a 'c'.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man S05 E04 - Stockholm With Sally Phillips
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and actress Sally Phillips head to Stockholm for a fulsome 48 hours in the Swedish capital. Together they scale rooftops, sing Abba, eat Swedish-Danish, and stay up late playing on their phones.

programme.title: DW Cities Reinvented
programme.sub-title: Cities Reinvented E01 - New York - Time For An Upgrade
programme.desc: Manhattan may be one of the worlds liveliest and richest places, but it is a slender island just 21 kilometers long and very crowded. Its buildings have been getting taller and taller. Many buildings from previous centuries need to be upgraded or replaced. The infrastructure is also severely strained. So large-scale eco-friendly redevelopment is on the cards, and the creation of neighborhoods that are pleasant places to live and work.

programme.title: DW Cities Reinvented
programme.sub-title: Cities Reinvented E02 - Tokyo - The Urban Village Concept
programme.desc: The Greater Tokyo Area is the worlds most populous metropolitan region, and it is continuing to grow at a fast pace. Urban-planning solutions are urgently needed to prevent Tokyo from choking on its own growth. Strategies include raising density, promoting shared housing and micro-homes, and investing in urban villages, neighborhoods where people can live, work and spend their leisure time.

programme.title: Euromaxx Architecture
programme.sub-title: Euromaxx Architecture E66 - Sustainable Living, Timeless Design Revival
programme.desc: Eighteen Stories and Made of Wood Bauhaus-style Architecture in Pamplona Pimp My Caravan Sustainable Building: the Cork House An Island Home in Brittany Frankfurt's New Old Town

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A Minnesota math teacher hopes it will all add up for a million-dollar win.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal

programme.title: Deal or No Deal

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A high-spirited marketing executive seeks to win $1 million in order to return home to her family farm in Ohio; as she faces the Banker's cruellest test, it turns out her father is the game show's biggest fan and her ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Artis Jackson seizes the chance to redeem his family's honour 13 years after his mother faced the Banker and walked away with only $5; now, Artis is determined to break the curse, while his mother agonises over the briefcases.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Rugged family man David Leeman brings a larger-than-life enthusiasm to his face-off with the Banker, as he strives to finally give his wife a dream wedding.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Howie Mandel's holiday special features a family that overcame extraordinary odds, an incredible adoption story and a player who pushes the limits to bring life-changing money home for the holidays.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Selfless speech therapist Robert Evans fills the stage with southern charm in his quest to defeat the Banker.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Entrepreneur Ally Teixeira dreams of changing the face of the ice cream industry forever; she tries to freeze out the Banker, playing for winnings that will fulfil her dream of opening a shop.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Entrepreneur Ally Teixeira dreams of changing the face of the ice cream industry forever; she tries to freeze out the Banker, playing for winnings that will fulfil her dream of opening a shop.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Poker player Shireen Mui goes all in against The Banker who calls her bluff with a specially crafted offer that puts her on the ropes.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Restaurateur George Stathoulis and his big Greek family take over the show in a loud, colourful and suspense-filled game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Retired automotive line worker John West wants to win a million dollars to retire in comfort and to provide a good future for his five sons; Howie has a surprise that stuns the West family and honours John's years of service to his family.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Howie Mandel can't keep up with fitness instructor Missy Silverman, who whistles and performs celebratory cartwheels; Missy dreams of taking her childhood friends on a dream cruise, if she can find it, before the offers end.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Super fan Sony Avalos makes it clear she knows how to play the game better than anyone else; this U.S. Marine specialist, wife and mother is a cool-headed risk taker, playing more than five rounds with no safety net on her way to a million.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Energetic cheerleader `Tex' Iniguez hopes to cheer her way to a million dollars, while bowling champion Kyera Chandler hopes to strike it rich and start her own business.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Bowling champion Kyera Chandler continues her quest to win, which includes a big prize for the studio audience, and elementary school principal Carri Nevad takes the stage for an incredible second game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Bowling champion Kyera Chandler continues her quest to win, which includes a big prize for the studio audience, and elementary school principal Carri Nevad takes the stage for an incredible second game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Flight attendant Max Reynolds buckles up, and he is ready to blast off against The Banker; a collaboration with the Blue Man Group sends Max to the stratosphere.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Business owner La'Sherrie Butler Hogan stops the show and the game by belting out an incredible strategy -- with an even more amazing voice -- as she takes on The Banker in "Deal or No Deal: The Musical."

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Miami police officer and Ironman competitor Jorge Montero seeks to secure his children's future; it's a race to the finish as The Banker tempts him, and the audience, with a bonus prize that could put the brakes on his chance for big bucks.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Real estate agent Toni Miller is used to buying and selling hot properties; Howie Mandel challenges her with a Monopoly-inspired game complete with money and prizes; Toni proves she knows what it means to go all-in and plays an extremely risky game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Single mother and marathoner Monica Durazo comes from a sales background and a family of competitors; with a million dollars on the line, Monica shows no fear as she battles The Banker to secure her daughter's future.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Lisa Glicksman knows exactly how to give The Banker a run for the money; this New York Stock Exchange day trader brings her Brooklyn grit to the `Deal or No Deal' stage and is ready to take risk after risk in order to get the deal of a lifetime.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Magician Penn Jillette joins magic lover Jennifer Gelband in her quest to find the million dollar case, and club promoter Tony Combs delivers non-stop energy and a dance party.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Magician Penn Jillette joins magic lover Jennifer Gelband in her quest to find the million dollar case, and club promoter Tony Combs delivers non-stop energy and a dance party.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Laura Siano plans to save, spend and share; this game comes with martinis and male models, but for Laura, it doesn't matter who's holding the cases because the offers keep going up until she makes a bold counteroffer that puts The Banker on her toes.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Jade Delaney believes in the power of positive thinking and has a vision board to prove it; now, she gets to cross three more items off her wish list, including meeting Howie Mandel, winning big money and becoming a "Deal or No Deal" model.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Andrew Shelton declares himself the `unluckiest person to ever play the game', as an omen of things to come, Howie turns things around with a special side game, and Andrew tries to get out from under a dark cloud to break his unlucky streak.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Jenn discusses Christmas trees; Richard explains what can and can't go down a garbage disposal after holiday dinners; Heath helps a homeowner safely install a variety of Christmas lights.

programme.desc: Nathan Gilbert helps a homeowner turn a reclaimed beam into a fireplace mantel; Richard Trethewey shows how to change a bathroom faucet; Ross Trethewey explores innovations to geothermal installations

programme.desc: Jenn demonstrates how to clean up a garden; Ross explains how air filters can catch unwanted air impurities and demonstrates how to build a DIY one; Tom and Kevin build an Adirondack chair.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard replaces a weird shower valve with a conventional pressure balanced one; Mauro repaints a radiator cover with lead paint on it; Tom explains how to identify and remove load bearing walls.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard explains how a mini split unit is installed; Jenn explains how to identify Japanese maple trees and how to incorporate them in a landscape design; Nathan installs a butcher block countertop.

programme.desc: Ross explores ways that landscaping could be done automatically; Mark goes over different walkway and driveway deicers and how they might impact masonry products; Tom and Kevin build a modern bench.

programme.desc: Tom travels to Nashville to turn an original, exterior door into a Dutch door; Richard explains how to install a garbage disposal; Mark and Jenn reface a concrete wall with thin stone veneer.

programme.desc: Tom explains how different sanders work and how to sand well; Mauro shows how to use a power washer to clean siding; the team share more home inspection nightmares; Heath installs deck railing lights.

programme.desc: Jenn travels to Orlando to upgrade a homeowner's irrigation system with a smart one; Heath explains a few different ways to troubleshoot flickering lights; Mark repoints a set of brick, front steps.

programme.desc: Jenn explains how to care for echinaceas; Mark explains how to cut stone with a saw and chisel; Richard replaces a kitchen sink and faucet; Tom helps a homeowner wrap up a few kitchen projects.

programme.title: Billion Dollar Babie by Tara Electra
programme.desc: Welcome to Billion Dollar Babie, the TV show and YouTube series designed to help you create YOUR billion-dollar life! This mind-shifting new show is hosted by serial entrepreneur Tara Electra, the CEO and Co-Founder of Unruly Agency, a full-scale agency specializing in social media management, influencer marketing, content creation, and more. But this isn't your standard entrepreneurial TV seriesTara is getting into bed (literally) with entrepreneurs, thought leaders, and top content creators who have carved their own paths and achieved life-changing success by being uniquely themselves. Every person has their own billion-dollar qualities, but it's hard to unlock them without a little guidance.

programme.title: Flying Over Spanish Islands
programme.desc: In their first collaboration, cinematographer Stefan Zimmerman and Nature Relaxation producer David Huting present "Above the Spanish Islands." This 50-minute 4K aerial film captures Mallorca and the Canary Islands, set to ambient music by Diamans, Electus, and Michael St. Laurent.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland
programme.desc: "Flying Over Iceland: Part I" provides a soothing aerial journey through eastern Iceland's fjords and valleys, starting at sunrise in Brei_dalsvik. Enjoy views of mists, a waterfall, and the Brei_dals' river, set to nature sounds and music by The Cynic Project, showcasing East Iceland's beauty.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland 2
programme.desc: "Flying Over Iceland II: Summer in the Golden Circle" presents a serene aerial view of Iceland's south coast, starting at Skogafoss and moving to Vik, with black sand beaches, cliffs, and Vatnajkull glacier. Filmed in 2020, this 1-hour film features local wildlife and immersive music.

programme.title: Flying Over Kauai
programme.desc: "Flying Over Kauai" provides a soothing aerial journey over Hawaii's Garden Island, featuring the lush NaPali Coast, waterfalls, canyons, and beaches. Paired with new music by The Cynic Project and nature sounds, this 4K film offers a visually and sonically immersive experience.

programme.title: Flying Over Oahu
programme.desc: "Flying Over Oahu" offers a 97-minute aerial journey over Oahu's iconic coastlines with nature sounds and music by Alex Smith (The Cynic Project). From Waikiki Beach to Turtle Bay, enjoy breathtaking 4K landscapes, ending with a stunning Waikiki sunset.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: In order to prepare a young Husky for life with his new family, Brandon must make sure that this former escape artist can part ways with his bad habits to prevent additional repeat visits to the local shelter.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: They're called Man's Best Friend, but for these five dogs, companionship defies age, size, gender and even species. Today we look back at some of this year's most heartwarming, and surprising, friendships.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: We revisit five of Lucky Dog's most lifesaving and life-changing adoptions, including a hearing-impaired Poodle mix that learns sign language and a Labrador that answers the call of duty for a diabetic veteran.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: A young miniature pinscher mix must learn to harness its energy before it can be placed with a fashion photographer who wants a dog that can join him in public.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: Let freedom ring! Brandon thinks a black German shepherd has what it takes to become a service dog. But is one-year-old Atlas ready to shoulder the needs of a disabled veteran?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: A large German Shepherd mix could offer companionship to a military family that's still mourning the loss of their previous dog. But Reggie will need to prove that he can be a gentle playmate for the family's two energetic young boys.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: A woman with Multiple Sclerosis seeks Brandon's help finding the perfect companion dog. But before an eight-month old Shepherd mix named Stanley can be cleared for his new home, he must prove that he has the patience and confidence to walk alongside a motorized wheelchair.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: Brandon reunites with a real estate agent, an assisted living facility manager, and the owner of a bed & breakfast, whose dogs were all trained to be welcoming of guests.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: To Serve and Protect. Brandon trains up a German Shepherd for a disabled veteran suffering from PTSD. But before Kyrie earns her service dog certification, she'll need to pick up the retrieve command.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.sub-title: Bring Your Dog to Work Day
programme.desc: Five rescued shelter dogs learn what it takes to join their future adopters in the workplace.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: A young Husky mix could be the perfect match for a couple that plans to have kids. But before Brandon hands over the reins, he'll need to make sure that this very active dog has the right temperament for a family.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: Eric comes across a sweet dachshund-mix that could be the perfect match for a newly single woman who has always wanted a dog.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: Before he can find a new home for a Golden Retriever-Collie mix that was surrendered by his previous family, Brandon must help the dog overcome separation anxiety.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: A chocolate lab mix named Yogi seems like the perfect companion for a couple of empty nesters. But until Brandon can help the dog overcome a severe case of anxiety, his training and transition home must be put on hold.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: Every dog has its day but training them takes a lot longer. Whether it's busting bad habits or cultivating news skills, true results require patience, consistency and above all else, taking it one step at a time."

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: A retired woman recovering from a severe foot injury thinks a canine companion could put a spring back in her step. But before a Maltese mix can be confirmed as the perfect partner, Brandon will need to train the dog to safely navigate a cane and walker.

programme.title: URBAN VIBES
programme.desc: All the 'original' Urban hits.

programme.title: HITS NON STOP
programme.desc: All the big tunes from around the world.

programme.title: The Sopranos: No Show
programme.desc: Christopher gets off to a bad start with Patsy, Meadow contemplates taking a year off college to travel around Europe and Tony warns Janice about her new love. Meanwhile, there are problems on the horizon at the Newark construction site and Adriana abruptly ends her friendship with Danielle. Crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: The Sopranos: Christopher
programme.desc: Silvio and Ralph try to ensure the Columbus Day parade takes place without any problems, Father Phil hosts an Italian Pride ladies' lunch, and Bobby's wife Karen is involved in a car accident. Meanwhile, Tony reflects on the importance of good role models. Starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The Wars to Come
programme.sub-title: The Wars to Come Season 5, Episode 1
programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in King's Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The House of Black and White
programme.sub-title: The House of Black and White Season 5, Episode 2
programme.desc: Arya arrives in Braavos, while Brienne and Pod run into trouble on the road, and Cersei fears for her daughter's safety in Dorne as Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for her lover Oberyn's death. Stannis has a proposal for Jon and an advisor tempts Daenerys. Fantasy drama, starring Maisie Williams, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Life in the Devon fishing port of Brixham. Spring is in the air, and the town is a hive of activity as skippers return their pleasure yachts to the water after winter in the dry dock, while the pressure is on for Brixham to look its best for the arrival of Princess Anne, who will officially open the new 20million fish market, and the start of the summer season

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Everyday life at Northumberland's Chillingham Castle, where the members of staff try to tactfully deal with the whims of their employer, baronet Humphry Wakefield, as the estate prepares to welcome a band of ghost-hunting tourists. Meanwhile, Carlton Towers in East Yorkshire hosts an annual dog show for Afghan hounds

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard try to impress American guests at Carlton Towers with a programme of traditional activities, including skinning rabbits and taking high tea. Meanwhile, Sir Humphry Wakefield entertains tourists on a wine-tasting weekend at Chillingham Castle

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire: William Wilson
programme.desc: Eli's oldest son Willie decides to turn his back on education and asks his Uncle Nucky for a job, enraging his father in the process. In Chicago, Al Capone is out for vengeance after a police officer shoots his brother Frank, while Margaret supports herself in New York by luring clients into a property trust scheme, but her life gets complicated when Rothstein turns up

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire: The Old Ship of Zion
programme.sub-title: The Old Ship of Zion Season 4, Episode 8
programme.desc: Nucky's alcohol shipment from Florida contains something he didn't order, while a frustrated Agent Knox gets a break in his investigation into the Atlantic City kingpin when he hears how Willie avoided jail for the Temple University student's death with the help of his uncle. Meanwhile, Chalky tries to regain control over his part of town and declares war on Dr Narcisse and his heroin business

programme.title: The Sopranos: The Weight
programme.desc: A nasty remark about his wife sets a livid Johnny on a personal vendetta, Meadow considers volunteer work at a law centre and Furio throws a big house-warming party. Meanwhile, Tony and Carmela fall out over money and a veteran hitman receives an offer from Silvio and Christopher

programme.title: The Sopranos: Pie-O-My
programme.desc: Adriana finds Christopher's business becoming increasingly noticeable at her club and Tony pays a visit to the track to check out Ralph's new horse. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Michael Imperioli and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: Game of Thrones: High Sparrow
programme.desc: In King's Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The Sons of the Harpy
programme.sub-title: The Sons of the Harpy Season 5, Episode 4
programme.desc: The militant arm of the Faith of the Seven grows more aggressive, Jaime and Bronn head south and Ellaria and the Sand Snakes vow vengeance

programme.title: The Wire: Refugees
programme.desc: Colvin pitches his pilot programme to the school, while Carcetti has a meeting with an influential group of ministers. Having transferred to Homicide, Greggs is assigned by Burrell to the high-profile witness case in an attempt to stall the investigation and Freamon joins Bunk to try to locate his missing murder suspect. After Marlo rejects an alliance with the New Day co-op, Proposition Joe gives Omar the address of a high-stakes card game he will be attending

programme.title: The Wire: Alliances
programme.desc: Burrell loses Royce's support after details of the Braddock case are leaked to the media, but the mayor incurs the wrath of Delegate Watkins. At school, Prez introduces new rules for his classes, and Colvin outlines his ideas for the research programme. Herc and Sydnor plant a hidden camera at the Stanfield crew's meeting place, Marlo arranges to have Omar framed for murder and Chris tries to recruit Michael

programme.title: Westworld: The Winter Line
programme.desc: Maeve finds herself in a new park and meets a ghost from the past. Meanwhile, Bernard makes his way back to Westworld. Starring Evan Rachel Wood and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Deadwood: Advances, None Miraculous
programme.desc: The town is left reeling in the wake of William's accident, and Hostetler and the General flee in fear of retribution once word gets out that the horse was in their care. Meanwhile, Swearengen finally receives word from Yankton. Drama, starring Ian McShane, Brad Dourif and Timothy Olyphant

programme.title: Game of Thrones: High Sparrow
programme.desc: In King's Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The Sons of the Harpy
programme.sub-title: The Sons of the Harpy Season 5, Episode 4
programme.desc: The militant arm of the Faith of the Seven grows more aggressive, Jaime and Bronn head south and Ellaria and the Sand Snakes vow vengeance

programme.title: Succession: I Went To Market
programme.sub-title: I Went To Market Season 1, Episode 5
programme.desc: Kendall begins to plot a vote of no confidence against Logan. Tom questions his prenup and recruits Greg for a clandestine task

programme.title: Succession: Which Side Are You On?
programme.sub-title: Which Side Are You On? Season 1, Episode 6
programme.desc: Roman and Kendall attempt to sway the board, while Shiv explores her options in Washington, DC

programme.title: Deadwood: Advances, None Miraculous
programme.desc: The town is left reeling in the wake of William's accident, and Hostetler and the General flee in fear of retribution once word gets out that the horse was in their care. Meanwhile, Swearengen finally receives word from Yankton. Drama, starring Ian McShane, Brad Dourif and Timothy Olyphant

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The webslinging hero battles a powerful new enemy when a downtrodden engineer develops lethal electrical powers, which he unleashes on those he believes have betrayed him. As if that wasn't enough to keep him busy, he faces an even greater threat when he is reunited with an unstable old friend who has been charged with a sinister mission by his dying father, leading to a series of tense confrontations that threaten to change his life for ever. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx and Dane DeHaan

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers are sent into war-torn Mogadishu in 1993 on a routine search and capture operation. Learning some of their compatriots have been shot down, they feel compelled to mount a perilous rescue attempt - one that descends into all-out conflict with heavily armed Somalians. Ridley Scott's fact-based drama, starring Josh Hartnett, Eric Bana, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore and Orlando Bloom

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The globe-trotting archaeologist teams up with a rebellious teenager who draws him into a search in the Amazon jungle for a mysterious artefact of untold power. But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder, and determined to save others suffering his same fate, biochemist Dr Michael Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. However, what at first appears to be a radical success soon reveals itself to be a remedy potentially worse than the disease, when he develops a form of vampirism. Comic-book adventure, starring Jared Leto, Matt Smith, Adria Arjona and Jared Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: A gifted teenager investigates the secrets hidden in his dead parents' past, leading him to a mysterious corporation and an incident that imbues him with superhuman powers. A personal tragedy drives him to use his new-found abilities to fight crime, and he is soon drawn into a deadly battle against a former colleague of his father, who has undergone a devastating transformation of his own. Superhero adventure reboot, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone and Rhys Ifans

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The webslinging hero battles a powerful new enemy when a downtrodden engineer develops lethal electrical powers, which he unleashes on those he believes have betrayed him. As if that wasn't enough to keep him busy, he faces an even greater threat when he is reunited with an unstable old friend who has been charged with a sinister mission by his dying father, leading to a series of tense confrontations that threaten to change his life for ever. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx and Dane DeHaan

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal 4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier

programme.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
programme.desc: An amnesiac teacher starts to experience disturbing flashbacks of her former life and hires a private eye to help her learn more about her history. His findings unearth a murky past and her involvement with a shadowy government organisation - whose agents have been dispatched to kill them both. Action thriller, with Geena Davis and Samuel L Jackson, alongside Patrick Malahide, Brian Cox and Craig Bierko

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: An evil sorcerer organises a deadly martial arts tournament between warriors from Earth and his own dimension. A secret agent on the trail of a ruthless crime boss, an action movie star trying to prove he can fight in real life and a man seeking revenge for his brother's death fight on behalf of the human race, with the Earth facing conquest if they lose. Fantasy adventure based on the video game, starring Christopher Lambert and Robin Shou

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago. Fantasy adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris and Malin Akerman

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder, and determined to save others suffering his same fate, biochemist Dr Michael Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. However, what at first appears to be a radical success soon reveals itself to be a remedy potentially worse than the disease, when he develops a form of vampirism. Comic-book adventure, starring Jared Leto, Matt Smith, Adria Arjona and Jared Harris

programme.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
programme.desc: An amnesiac teacher starts to experience disturbing flashbacks of her former life and hires a private eye to help her learn more about her history. His findings unearth a murky past and her involvement with a shadowy government organisation - whose agents have been dispatched to kill them both. Action thriller, with Geena Davis and Samuel L Jackson, alongside Patrick Malahide, Brian Cox and Craig Bierko

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors' 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride Or Die
programme.desc: Fugitives from the law they swore to protect, Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett run a gauntlet of duplicitous police officers and gun-toting criminals in an attempt to clear their late captain's name. Fourth chapter in the action adventure franchise, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens and Ioan Gruffudd

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: American soldiers are sent into war-torn Mogadishu in 1993 on a routine search and capture operation. Learning some of their compatriots have been shot down, they feel compelled to mount a perilous rescue attempt - one that descends into all-out conflict with heavily armed Somalians. Ridley Scott's fact-based drama, starring Josh Hartnett, Eric Bana, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore and Orlando Bloom

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is in exile with both halves of the 3D cruciform key that can unlock the source code of rogue AI creation, the Entity. Hunt returns to London to reunite with Luther Stickell, Benji Dunn and former thief Grace. The Entity's human henchman, Gabriel, is still on the loose, so Hunt bolsters his ranks with vengeful French assassin Paris and US intelligence agent Theo Degas. Action thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg and Esai Morales

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. In this realm of magic and wonder, Lucas locks eyes with inquisitive nymph Mavka, who yearns to rebuild bridges between the human and spirit worlds. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Natalka Denisenko, Artem Pyvovarov and Olena Kravets

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New York's Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: A woman is exposed to radiation from a meteorite that causes her to grow to an enormous size during her wedding. She is captured by the military and held prisoner with an assortment of strange creatures - but when aliens invade, these freaks of nature are the only ones capable of saving the world. Animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Reese Witherspoon and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: The caped crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker, but must also deal with changes in her personal life after adopting a teenage orphan - who wants to serve as his sidekick. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: When Bodi and his band True Blue leave Snow Mountain to tour with pop sensation Lil' Foxy, they learn that fame comes at a price. Animated comedy, with the voices of Graham Hamilton, Kathleen Barr, Michael Adamthwaite and Ashleigh Ball

programme.title: Rock Dog 3: Battle The Beat
programme.desc: When the young performers on a music contest show admit they have never heard of Angus Scattergood, Bodi is compelled to join the show to restore the Rock Legend's good name. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Graham Hamilton and Eddie Izzard

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Fred, Velma and Daphne face their most challenging mystery yet - a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. Along the way, they discover that Scooby has a destiny greater than anyone ever imagined. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Forte, Mark Wahlberg, Jason Isaacs, Zac Efron and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Wide-eyed kitten Garfield is abandoned by his father Vic and left in an alleyway. Years later, when the ginger moggie has been 'adopted' by long-suffering human Jon Arbuckle, a case of catnapping reunites the pet with his crooked father. Before long, the feline and doggy pal Odie are forced to take part in a heist. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. In this realm of magic and wonder, Lucas locks eyes with inquisitive nymph Mavka, who yearns to rebuild bridges between the human and spirit worlds. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Natalka Denisenko, Artem Pyvovarov and Olena Kravets

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs Mutants
programme.desc: The Dark Knight battles old enemies who have been transformed into giant monsters. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Oded Fehr

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren steals the Book of Legends to locate the Trident of Atlantis so she can reign supreme over the ocean. Animation with the voice of Yvette Nicole Brown

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the Mystery, Inc. gang back to olden times full of brave knights, spell-casting wizards and fire-breathing dragons

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Rock Dog 3: Battle The Beat
programme.desc: When the young performers on a music contest show admit they have never heard of Angus Scattergood, Bodi is compelled to join the show to restore the Rock Legend's good name. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Graham Hamilton and Eddie Izzard

programme.title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
programme.desc: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the legendary Megaloceros Giganteus, who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life. Family animation, with the voices of Sam Hardy, Hannah Herman Cortes, Pierce Brosnan and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Fred, Velma and Daphne face their most challenging mystery yet - a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. Along the way, they discover that Scooby has a destiny greater than anyone ever imagined. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Forte, Mark Wahlberg, Jason Isaacs, Zac Efron and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Wide-eyed kitten Garfield is abandoned by his father Vic and left in an alleyway. Years later, when the ginger moggie has been 'adopted' by long-suffering human Jon Arbuckle, a case of catnapping reunites the pet with his crooked father. Before long, the feline and doggy pal Odie are forced to take part in a heist. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: After being bitten by a radioactive arachnid, student Miles Morales develops incredible abilities, and becomes a version of Spider-Man. When a super collider device opens a gateway to other dimensions, Miles crosses paths with five counterparts to stop a threat for all realities. Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Shameik Moore and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a car's exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
programme.desc: The bungling leader of a band of inept buccaneers is determined to prove his worth to his rivals and win the coveted Pirate of the Year award. An encounter with the naturalist Charles Darwin gives him the chance to pull off a daring crime - if he can survive coming face to face with the pirate-hating Queen Victoria. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
programme.desc: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the legendary Megaloceros Giganteus, who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life. Family animation, with the voices of Sam Hardy, Hannah Herman Cortes, Pierce Brosnan and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs Mutants
programme.desc: The Dark Knight battles old enemies who have been transformed into giant monsters. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Oded Fehr

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: A sex worker marries the son of an oligarch, but his family in Russia try to get the marriage annulled. Writer/director Sean Baker's Oscar-winning romantic comedy, starring Mikey Madison, Paul Weissman and Lindsey Normington

programme.title: Miss You Already
programme.desc: Best friends Milly and Jess have been inseparable since they were young girls, but they find their relationship is put to the test when one of them starts a family and the other receives devastating news. Romantic comedy drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Toni Collette, Dominic Cooper and Paddy Considine

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parker's psychological drama, based on William Wharton's novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas

programme.title: Escape to Victory
programme.desc: Allied PoWs take to the football field when a group of Nazi officers comes up with the idea to have them take on a German team for a propaganda event. However, the prisoners see a chance to escape during the match. Second World War adventure, with Michael Caine, Sylvester Stallone, Max von Sydow and Daniel Massey. Soccer legends also making appearances include Pele, Bobby Moore and Ossie Ardiles

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Ice skater Tonya Harding rises through the ranks at the US figure skating championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into question by a shocking incident after her ex-husband steps in. Director Craig Gillespie's comedy biopic, starring Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, and Allison Janney, who won a Bafta and an Oscar for her performance

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Escape to Victory
programme.desc: Allied PoWs take to the football field when a group of Nazi officers comes up with the idea to have them take on a German team for a propaganda event. However, the prisoners see a chance to escape during the match. Second World War adventure, with Michael Caine, Sylvester Stallone, Max von Sydow and Daniel Massey. Soccer legends also making appearances include Pele, Bobby Moore and Ossie Ardiles

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: A middle-class family take in a hulking homeless teenager, who has no education or skills to speak of. The indomitable wife encourages him to turn his life around, helping him to get the grades he needs for a college scholarship and hone his sporting skills to become an American football player. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock alongside Quinton Aaron and Tim McGraw

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: A Navy recruit undergoing officer training has an uneasy romance with a factory worker. He also attracts the attention of a tough, uncompromising sergeant, who sees his potential and is determined to push him to the limit. Romantic drama, starring Richard Gere, Debra Winger, Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Loggia, David Keith and David Caruso

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Ice skater Tonya Harding rises through the ranks at the US figure skating championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into question by a shocking incident after her ex-husband steps in. He also attracts the attention of a tough, uncompromising sergeant, who sees his potential and is determined to push him to the limit. Romantic drama, starring Richard Gere, Debra Winger, Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Loggia, David Keith and David Caruso

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: A retired army colonel has raised his three sons alone on their remote Montana ranch. But the all-male household is thrown into turmoil when the youngest son brings home his beautiful fiancee, causing jealousy and tensions that culminate in tragedy. Edward Zwick's period drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond and Henry Thomas

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: Blueback
programme.desc: A youngster befriends a wild blue fish and takes on the poachers threatening it. Director Robert Connolly's drama based on the novel by Tim Winton, starring Mia Wasikowska, Eric Bana and Ariel Donoghue

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owen's update to Charles Dickens' Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Young agent Juni has to go it alone when his big sister Carmen is kidnapped by the evil Toymaker, forcing the plucky junior spy to infiltrate the villain's virtual reality world to rescue her. Adventure sequel, starring Daryl Sabara, Alexa Vega, Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Ricardo Montalban, George Clooney, Steve Buscemi, Salma Hayek and Elijah Wood

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: A single father is determined to become a police officer but fails the medical because he is overweight. To compensate, he goes to absurd lengths to succeed in his job as a security guard, but when criminals lay siege to his place of work, he finds his opportunity to prove his worth to law enforcement. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Keir O'Donnell

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel House's comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: A family of four-inch-high people living beneath the floorboards of an ordinary human home help the owner's son fight back when a dastardly lawyer plans to demolish the house and make way for a luxury apartment block. Children's fantasy, starring John Goodman, Jim Broadbent, Celia Imrie, Flora Newbigin and Tom Felton

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: A kindly farmer wins a cute piglet, which some greedy humans and jealous animals hope will end up as the Christmas roast. Undaunted, the young pig proves himself useful on the farm and enlists the aid of the resident dog in learning how to herd sheep. Family comedy, starring James Cromwell and Magda Szubanski, with Christine Cavanaugh, Miriam Margolyes and Hugo Weaving among those providing the voices of the animal characters

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in a parallel universe populated by magical and menacing characters. When her best friend becomes the latest in a long line of children to mysteriously vanish, she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the dark secret behind their disappearance. Fantasy adventure based on Philip Pullman's novel Northern Lights, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig and Eva Green. Featuring the voices of Ian McKellen, Kristin Scott Thomas and Kathy Bates

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth. The two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescue. However, living on Earth starts to have a devastating effect on the visitor's health, and a government operative is determined to capture him for study. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi fantasy, starring Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Dee Wallace and Peter Coyote

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: A young girl called named Bea goes through a difficult time with her father and suddenly gains the ability to see imaginary friends (IFs). Bea learns her upstairs neighbour Cal also possesses the same power and they join forces to matchmake IFs with new children. Fantasy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Cailey Fleming, with John Krasinski, who also wrote and directed

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Scientist Trevor Anderson sets out to locate his missing explorer brother after receiving a book charting his last journey. Accompanied by his nephew and an Icelandic guide, he is led to a mountain peak, where he stumbles across a system of caves leading to a lost underground world. Fantasy adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson and Anita Briem

programme.title: Blueback
programme.desc: A youngster befriends a wild blue fish and takes on the poachers threatening it. Director Robert Connolly's drama based on the novel by Tim Winton, starring Mia Wasikowska, Eric Bana and Ariel Donoghue

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The pint-sized secret agents investigate a mad scientist who has meddled with powerful forces and created a host of bizarre mutant animals. However, the villain is not the only problem they have to face, as another pair of youngsters are determined to outshine them. Family adventure sequel, starring Antonio Banderas, Steve Buscemi and Carla Gugino

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Musical based on The Wizard of Oz, featuring an all-black cast. Dorothy is suddenly whisked off to a magical land and makes some unusual friends as she tries to get back home, while avoiding the malevolent attentions of a wicked witch. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored youngsters are led on a series of zany misadventures when a manic moggy comes knocking at their door with a magical stovepipe hat on his head and mischief in mind. Comedy fantasy based on the children's book by Dr Seuss, starring Mike Myers, Alec Baldwin, Dakota Fanning and Spencer Breslin

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth.
