programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.desc: When nerdy Steve Carell's pals find out he's still a virgin they vow to help him out. Hit Judd Apatow comedy with Paul Rudd and Catherine Keener. Strong language/sex.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: A successful and good-looking music executive gets stranded in his New Jersey hometown and becomes reacquainted with the woman who, years earlier, rejected him in high school.

programme.desc: Scary sci-fi comedy. Can David Duchovny, Julianne Moore and Orlando Jones save humanity from a rapidly evolving, predatory alien species? Well, DD used to be Fox Mulder, so...

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars in Semi-Pro, an outrageous comedy set in 1976 against the backdrop of the maverick ABA a wild and crazy basketball league that attempted to rival the NBA.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Long-haired layabouts Mike Myers and Dana Carvey try to rescue their TV show from unscrupulous exec Rob Lowe. Contains strong language, sexual scenes and flashing images.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Comedy's most loveable metalheads are commanded by Jim Morrison's ghost to stage a rock concert. But their task is threatened when a sleazy record exec tries to steal Wayne's girl.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: When nerdy Steve Carell's pals find out he's still a virgin they vow to help him out. Hit Judd Apatow comedy with Paul Rudd and Catherine Keener. Strong language/sex.

programme.desc: Hapless cop Frank Drebin causes more problems than he solves while trying to stop a deadly plot involving Queen Elizabeth II.

programme.desc: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

programme.desc: The further misadventures of bumbling Los Angeles police Lieutenant Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) are chronicled in this third installment in the popular Naked Gun comedy series.

programme.desc: Following in his father's footsteps, a detective works to solve a murder case and save his police department from closure.

Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere

programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barrett's relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

Sci-fi thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Geoffrey Lewis and Austin O'Brien

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: The nomadic warrior pitches up in the city of a cut-throat desert community in search of his stolen vehicle and ends up making a deal with a local dictator to get rid of her rival for power. However, when the bargain turns sour, he is cast out into the wilderness - where he becomes the unlikely protector of a tribe of feral youngsters. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Mel Gibson, Tina Turner and Bruce Spence

programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planet's surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Ho's sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: A woman and her friends survive a plane crash, but discover something more dangerous lurking in the shallows of the Louisiana everglades. Horror thriller, starring Athena Strates and Madalena Arago

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether they're better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more. Romantic comedy, starring Anthony Mackie and Zoe Chao

programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his 'mother', he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances O'Connor

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herbert's acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.desc: A small-time private eye uncovers a gruesome secret when he investigates the husband of a wealthy socialite. As he is drawn deeper into the tangled web of lies and corruption, the case becomes ever more complicated. Roman Polanski's Oscar-winning mystery, starring Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston and Perry Lopez

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A stranded motorist is desperate when his wife disappears without a trace on a road trip - and the reluctance of the locals to help convinces him something sinister is going on. When it turns out that she has been abducted by a crazed trucker and his cronies, he is determined to set her free and make sure the villains pay for their crime. Thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Kathleen Quinlan, JT Walsh, MC Gainey, Jack Noseworthy and Rex Linn

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. Crime drama, starring Eric Bana and Genevieve O'Reilly

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A nuclear power plant controller discovers a potentially disastrous operational flaw but refuses to report it. A visiting TV journalist and cameraman pick up on the story - but as they struggle to get the news on air, a quick-witted engineer realises the danger is far more pronounced than anyone suspects. Thriller, starring Jane Fonda, Michael Douglas, Jack Lemmon and Scott Brady

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppola's 2020 director's cut of The Godfather: Part III, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Maintenance and upgrades that can be done to a classic vehicle to keep and increase the value; what should be left alone to ensure the value of the original build is maintained.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey marries a zero-turn mower with a Cornwell toolbox to create the world's first zero-turn tool box. Later, he takes out for a test drive, but he's also going to show you all the steps it took to build it!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey shows how to tell an original from a clone by rolling in the real Copperhead; a replica that sold at a recent auction; he introduces an all-female crew making waves rebuilding carburetors, then heads to the 2023 Grand National Roadster show.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.sub-title: The Cheetah Big Booty and Steering Upgrades
programme.desc: The Cheetah is back in the shop after some major frame modifications, planting this 630hp cat's booty firmly to the ground; Stacey shows the benefits of a leaner, strong rear end, along with matching brakes, while the front end also gets upgrades.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a rare 1967 Jeepster and shows how to successfully change the direction of a project when it throws you a major curveball; checking out the Keep On Truckin' event at the Grand National Roadster Show.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The '67 Jeepster is back, as Stacey goes underneath and deals with the saggy suspension, faded brakes and oh-so-many leaks. It's all part of a continuing level-1 restoration, and well within the scope of what most people can do in their own garage.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey visits the Lions Automobilia Museum to tell the story of the iconic Lions Drag Strip, home to hot-rodders and drag racers from 1955 to 1972; he turns back the clock to a time when a guy could swap a cam and a carb, then show up ready to race.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.sub-title: Lil' Red Wagon Interior (Featuring Carpet Stains and Mouse Pee)
programme.desc: Stacey uses his old Lil' Red Wagon Dodge to show how to stop the deterioration cycle that sets in when a vehicle sits for an extended period of time; he shows how to look past the faded paint and flat tires to focus on things that matter.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: To pay tribute to the early hot rod spirit, Stacey rolls in a 1940 Chevy coupe and puts together a hot small block to go in it; multiple carbs, finned aluminum and plenty of horsepower are just some of the magic ingredients that make this rod roar.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Little Red Wagon is back on the chopping block, as Stacey continues upgrading the interior of this well-worn '99 Dodge truck; he adds new carpet and headliner, repaints the door panels and changes the interior color, all on a reasonable budget.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: When laying out a hot rod build, a lot of people make the mistake of overlooking the chassis and frame; Stacey digs into a full frame replacement to make sure a 1940 Chevy can handle everything he's going to throw at it.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey proves that not all toolboxes are created equal with Cornwell's new ARCA series, then checks out a record-breaking '63 'Vette with a Cummins diesel; he digs into barn finds, picks accessories and exhaust for the '40 Chevy hot rod, and more.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey visits a father-and-son team who are literally upside down in their restoration of an old C10 pickup; back in the garage, Stacey shows the importance of a compressed air system for tools.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: In the start of Project Red Bird, Stacey digs into a well-worn '98 Trans Am to see if he can't unlock its hidden potential on a reasonable budget.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into the rear suspension of the LS-powered '98 Trans Am to show how upgrading each component can improve handling.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: With the front and rear suspensions beefed up on project Red Bird, the '98 Trans Am should be ready to fly; Stacey has a few more upgrades that need to be addressed.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey takes three Cornwell toolboxes and turns them into drivable vehicles by pulling parts from junk yards, Craigslist and Facebook Marketplace.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Now that the old Bird's suspension is beefed up, Stacey has to make sure it's going to stop, so he outfits it with some massive Baer brakes.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you don't have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: Corsica, the Island of Beauty, is best explored by railway; from Mediterranean waters to towering peaks, stops include Algajola for a seaside dive, Vizzanova on the GR20 trail and historic cities like Corte with its citadel.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: The Cinque Terre Express runs along Italy's northern coast east of Genoa; passing through five UNESCO-listed villages, it offers coastal views and access to cobbled streets, harbors, terraced vineyards and pastel-colored houses.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: The Little Yellow Train winds through the Eastern Pyrenees, crossing the Cerdan plateau, the historic Gisclard railway suspension bridge and the Grandes Canalettes caves, known as the underground Versailles of the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: Andalusia, now crossed by high-speed and modernized rail lines, unveils its rich culture and landscapes; along the journey, we visit cities like Seville, Granada with its famed Alhambra and Guadix near the Tabernas desert.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Greece, the Intercity Express travels from Thessaloniki to Athens, passing sites like the Meteora peaks, Delphi ruins and the Acropolis; the journey continues to the Peloponnese on Greece's last cogwheel train.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Portugal, in the Douro River Valley, a steam locomotive and a small historic train will take you in turn to the water's edge, on the only railroad line in the world that crosses three World Heritage Sites classified by UNESCO.

programme.desc: The Cinque Terre Express runs along Italy's northern coast east of Genoa; passing through five UNESCO-listed villages, it offers coastal views and access to cobbled streets, harbors, terraced vineyards and pastel-colored houses.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: The Little Yellow Train winds through the Eastern Pyrenees, crossing the Cerdan plateau, the historic Gisclard railway suspension bridge and the Grandes Canalettes caves, known as the underground Versailles of the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Portugal, in the Douro River Valley, a steam locomotive and a small historic train will take you in turn to the water's edge, on the only railroad line in the world that crosses three World Heritage Sites classified by UNESCO.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks the Mediterranean
